name: Proof_359 — Morning Inspection of an Empty Duck Shelter MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the morning routine at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
20 December 2025 at 07:27 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee walking into the duck shelter during the early morning, despite the absence of ducks. Following the disappearance of the last remaining duck, the shelter remains empty.

This moment records continuity of human behavior and responsibility. Even without animals present, the routine inspection continues as part of daily farm life.

The shelter structure, feeding containers, and ground conditions remain intact, reflecting a transition phase rather than abandonment. The act of inspection itself is preserved as real-world evidence of persistence and habit formed through long-term care.

This record is captured as-is, without staging or narrative alteration.
The embedded timestamp ensures temporal traceability under DGCP principles of ground-truth, continuity, and human presence.

This proof belongs to the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection.
